bibl.title: The Greek Magical Papyri in Translation, Including the Demotic Spells. I: Texts.
bibl.note: Introd. - Translation (with notes) of Greek, Demotic, and Coptic texts found in P.G.M. 2nd ed., with transl. of 50 additional texts. - Vol. II will consist of indexes to the English transl. in vol. I as well as to the Greek text editions.
bibl.seg: Betz Hans Dieter (Ed.), The Greek Magical Papyri in Translation, Including the Demotic Spells. I: Texts.
Chicago - London, The University of Chicago Press, 1986, 4Â°, lviii-339 pp., figg.
